Parameter name

standard value

unidentified distro

zeroincombenze(R

oca distro

personal distro

Note

ROOT (Odoo root)

~/%V

~/zero%M

~/oca%M

~/odoo_%M

i.e. ~/oca14

CONFN (configuration file)

odoo.conf odoo-server.conf

odoo%M-server.conf

odoo%M-zero.conf

odoo%M-oca.conf

odoo%M-PUID.conf

Directory /etc/odoo (see Odoo structure)

USER (db user)

odoo

odoo%M

odoo%M

odoo%M

odoo%M

i.e odoo12

FLOG (log file)

odoo.log odoo-server.log

odoo%M-server.log

odoo%M-zero.log

odoo%M-oca.log

odoo%M-PUID.log

Directory /var/log/odoo

FPID (pid file)

odoo.pid odoo-server.pid

odoo%M-server.pid

odoo%M-zero.pid

odoo%M-oca.pid

odoo%M-PUID.pid

Directory /var/run/odoo

RPCPORT (xmlrpc port)

8069

8160 + %M

8460 + %M

8260 + %M

8360 + %M

LPPORT (longpolling)

8072

8130 + %M

8430 + %M

8230 + %M

8330 + %M

SVCNAME (service name)

odoo odoo-server

odoo%M odoo%M-server

odoo%M-zero

odoo%M-oca

odoo%M-PUID
